# Ertl-style oscillator with Pt SC(111) crystal.


# Run settings
pixels_per_node    = 10
speedup_factor     = 0.5
debug              = True
rng_seed           = 123123122
max_duration       = 50
node_display       = color
wrap               = false
geometry           = square

!END_INIT_STATE


!START_TRANSITION_RULES
# Adsorption
(1) Pt -> CO
(0.3) Pt + Pt -> O + O

# Reaction
(1) CO + O -> CO2 + Pt

# Diffusion
(1) CO + Pt -> Pt + CO
(1) O + Pt -> Pt + O

# Desorption
(2) CO2 -> Pt

!END_TRANSITION_RULES

# Colormap
!START_COLORMAP

!END_COLORMAP
